validation_notes.dates: Project Plan contains: project_start_date (2022-01-01), crediting_period_start (2022-01-01), submission_date (2023-08-09). Baseline Report contains: imagery_date (2022-06-15), sampling_date (2022-08-20). These dates should align within the 120-day validation window.
validation_notes.land_tenure: Nicholas Denman owns the property. Name may appear as 'Nick Denman' or 'N. Denman' in some documents. Total area is 120.5 hectares.
validation_notes.project_ids: Official Regen Network ID is C06-006 (appears in Registry Agent Review documents). Internal project names are 4997Botany22 (2022) and 4998Botany23 (2023). The Project Plan only contains internal names, not the Regen Network ID.
